com.bugielmarek.crudone.services.impls

Class UserServiceImpl

  • Object
    • UserServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserService

    @Service
public class UserServiceImpl
extends Object
implements UserService
    Provides the base model implementation for User service. Allows creating, reading, updating, deleting users.
    Author:
    Bugiel Marek
